description: A local attacker can erscalate privileges on affected Check Point ZoneAlarm ExtremeSecurity NextGen, Identity Agent for Windows, and Identity Agent for Windows Terminal Server. To exploit this vulnerability, an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute local privileged code on the target system.

product.name: ZoneAlarm Extreme Security NextGen, Identity Agent for Windows, Identity Agent for Windows Terminal Server
ZoneAlarm Extreme Security NextGen, Identity Agent for Windows, Identity Agent for Windows Terminal Server

enisaIdProduct.product_version: ZoneAlarm Extreme Security NextGen - versions lower than 4.2.7, Identity Agent for Windows - versions lower than R81.070.0000, Identity Agent for Windows Terminal Server - versions lower than R81.070.0000
